title: Client lagging (Eg. Like the game is going in slow motion)
body: Recently today I hopped in my Silver 2 series and lost the first one due to a problem that is very foreign to me. I have been experiencing a frequent issue today where the game seems to rubber band/slow down/ jerk, it makes the game unplayable, this would be explainable if I was experiencing lag but no my FPS is at a constant 143-144 (when it drops to 143 that is when it lags most of the time) and a ping measure of 35-39 ms. I have ran speed test and ping test to no avail. I have tried everything I can think of e.g . updating invidia drivers, changing settings like enabling V-Sync, but to success. I would like to know if any of you fellow summoners are experiencing this issue. Also if you have any solutions or tips for me! Thank you for reading!

replies.body:
The symptoms you've described are very common to *Packet Loss* or *Extreme Packet Buffering*. These issues are caused by a poor connection to our game servers and may be resolved by working through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). That guide includes common solutions for these issues, which is why I recommend working through it as your next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps resolved the issue.
